widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: JLD Database Upgrade:
config.description: We managed to update this database with minimum downtime impact to the Justia Lawyer Directory.

config.title: IT Maintenance and Upgrades:
config.description: Our IT Team keeps our servers high-performing and upgraded. This month, we upgraded and migrated the Verdict WordPress installation, the NodeJS server where we run screenshots for our client websites and AMP tests, and the NDV server used for internal development.

config.title: Regulations:
config.description: The quarterly state regulations update took place this month. We are transitioning to a better source in partnership with FastCase, ready for the next release.

config.title: QA Automation:
config.description: Our QA Team released automated QA jobs for both quarterly state regulations updates and Oyez.

config.title: Updated all WordPress Installations:
config.description: We upgraded all our Client and Justia WordPress installations (including Elevate) with the latest security patches available.

config.title: Amplify Reports:
config.description: This month, we finished with delayed LSA charges for two months. This adjustment is now reflected on the internal accounting report as well as the Amplify client reports.

config.title: State Codes 2021:
config.description: Even though we are very close to finishing with the 2020 versions of our State Codes, we started early with the 2021 versions for the states of Iowa and Kentucky.
